intro.text: You, dear reader, found yourself drawn into the echoes of the vessel too. The winds await your decision. Choose your path wisely, for your choices will resonate through the universe and Mystura will feel your presence. You, [insert name], are also on Eden as a

choices.text: Artist
Comrade

artist_intro.text: Your heart resonates with the echoes of Mr. Adam's legacy. You understand Mr Hoom’s rage, but you understand this is beyond him and his family heirloom. You want the vessel to be found and returned to Eden. What do you do next?

choices.text: Your curiosity peaks and you go find the site where the crew is building the vehicle.
You decide to spread the word about why the ethereal vessel is important.
Your anger towards the leaders becomes rage and you decide to join Mr Hoom’s comrades.

artist_find_site.text: The spaceship, crafted by the crew, stood before you—a motor destined to sail the currents. Do you join the quest to reclaim the stolen vessel?

choices.text: Yes, and I want to travel with the rest of the crew.
Yes, but only with building the spacecraft, I don’t think it’s important I go with them.
No, the site is so rowdy and scary, I take note of everything and go back into town.

artist_spread_word.text: You spend the next months spreading the gospel of the vessel, the need for peace amongst everyone. Through your art, you explain to everyone that the leaders are being influenced by fear. You stay updated on the quest and continue to wish the crew success.

artist_join_comrades.text: You understand Mr Hoom’s rage and approach him asking to be a comrade. Mr Hoom asks you to decide what you want to do as a comrade.

choices.text: Would you build the spacecraft with him?
